title: Suki ni Nattemo Ii desu ka
original_name: 好きになってもいいですか
sinopse:
Sakumari Ichi, a handsome guy, helped her when she was late at her entrance in school. after that, she looked for him and saw how popular Sakumari is...

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Included one-shots: Hatsukoi to Akanezora, Koibito no Susume
